abstract: Even as Internet video viewing increases, the vast majority of American households are still paying for cable TV subscriptions and watching most video that way; about 100 million households pay for TV subscriptions.
snippet: Even as Internet video viewing increases, the vast majority of American households are still paying for cable TV subscriptions and watching most video that way.
lead_paragraph: Even as Internet video viewing increases, the vast majority of American households are still paying for cable TV subscriptions and watching most video that way.

headline.main: Cable Is Holding Web TV at Bay, Earnings Show
headline.print_headline: Cable Is Holding Web TV at Bay, Earnings Show
headline.seo: Cable TV Holding Web Rivals at Bay, Earnings Show
